May be longer for stud animals • Droughts, floods etc may make movement further • Technology allows for greater movement with increased bidding e.g. Auctionsplus interface with live sale Sheep production systems • Self replacing wool (54%) • Self replacing meat (25%) • Wether based (6%) • Crossbred (3%) • Trading and other (12%) Data from ABAREs with local knowledge https://www.woolwise.com/wp- content/uploads/2017/07/WOOL-300-300-14-T-01.pdf https://www.woolwise.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/WOOL-300-300-14-T-01.pdf EMI – the Eastern Market IndicatorMajor shifts identified by early 2000s • 1. Shift to lower micron flocks, particularly in Merino production • 2. Shift to overall higher bodyweight ewes • 3. Reduction in overall wether numbers being retained past 2 years of age • 4.
